  16. open Format
  17. include Topcommon
  18. include Topeval

  20. ‌type input =
  21.   | Stdin
  22.   | File of string
  23.   | String of string

  25. ‌let use_print_results = ref true

  27. ‌let filename_of_input = function
  28.   | File name -> name
  29.   | Stdin | String _ -> ""

  31. ‌let use_lexbuf ppf ~wrap_in_module lb name filename =
  32.   Warnings.reset_fatal ();
  33.   Location.init lb filename;
  34.   (* Skip initial #! line if any *)
  35.   Lexer.skip_hash_bang lb;
  36.   Misc.protect_refs
  37.     [ R (Location.input_name, filename);
  38.       R (Location.input_lexbuf, Some lb); ]
  39.     (fun () ->
  40.     try
  41.       List.iter
  42.         (fun ph ->
  43.           let ph = preprocess_phrase ppf ph in
  44.           if not (execute_phrase !use_print_results ppf ph) then raise Exit)
  45.         (if wrap_in_module then
  46.            parse_mod_use_file name lb
  47.          else
  48.            !parse_use_file lb);
  49.       true
  50.     with
  51.     | Exit -> false
  52.     | Sys.Break -> fprintf ppf "Interrupted.@."; false
  53.     | x -> Location.report_exception ppf x; false)

  55. let use_output ppf command =
  56.   let fn = Filename.temp_file "ocaml" "_toploop.ml" in
  57.   Misc.try_finally ~always:(fun () ->
  58.       try Sys.remove fn with Sys_error _ -> ())
  59.     (fun () ->
  60.        match
  61.          Printf.ksprintf Sys.command "%s > %s"
  62.            command
  63.            (Filename.quote fn)
  64.        with
  65.        | 0 ->
  66.          let ic = open_in_bin fn in
  67.          Misc.try_finally ~always:(fun () -> close_in ic)
  68.            (fun () ->
  69.             let lexbuf = (Lexing.from_channel ic) in
  70.             use_lexbuf ppf ~wrap_in_module:false lexbuf "" "(command-output)")
  71.        | n ->
  72.          fprintf ppf "Command exited with code %d.@." n;
  73.          false)

  75. let use_input ppf ~wrap_in_module input =
  76.   match input with
  77.   | Stdin ->
  78.     let lexbuf = Lexing.from_channel stdin in
  79.     use_lexbuf ppf ~wrap_in_module lexbuf "" "(stdin)"
  80.   | String value ->
  81.     let lexbuf = Lexing.from_string value in
  82.     use_lexbuf ppf ~wrap_in_module lexbuf "" "(command-line input)"
  83.   | File name ->
  84.     match Load_path.find name with
  85.     | filename ->
  86. ‌      let ic = open_in_bin filename in
  87.       Misc.try_finally ~always:(fun () -> close_in ic)
  88.         (fun () ->
  89. ‌          let lexbuf = Lexing.from_channel ic in
  90.           use_lexbuf ppf ~wrap_in_module lexbuf name filename)
  91.     | exception Not_found ->
  92.       fprintf ppf "Cannot find file %s.@." name;
  93.       false

  95. ‌let mod_use_input ppf name =
  96.   use_input ppf ~wrap_in_module:true name
  97. ‌let use_input ppf name =
  98.   use_input ppf ~wrap_in_module:false name
  99. ‌let use_file ppf name =
  100.   use_input ppf (File name)

  102. ‌let use_silently ppf name =
  103.   Misc.protect_refs
  104.     [ R (use_print_results, false) ]
  105.     (fun () -> use_input ppf name)

  107. let load_file = load_file false

  109. (* Execute a script.  If [name] is "", read the script from stdin. *)

  111. let run_script ppf name args =
  112.   Clflags.debug := true;
  113.   override_sys_argv args;
  114.   let filename = filename_of_input name in
  115.   Compmisc.init_path ~dir:(Filename.dirname filename) ();
  116.                    (* Note: would use [Filename.abspath] here, if we had it. *)
  117.   begin
  118.     try toplevel_env := Compmisc.initial_env()
  119.     with Env.Error _ | Typetexp.Error _ as exn ->
  120.       Location.report_exception ppf exn; raise (Compenv.Exit_with_status 2)
  121.   end;
  122.   Sys.interactive := false;
  123.   run_hooks After_setup;
  124. ‌  let explicit_name =
  125.     match name with
  126.     | File name as filename  -> (
  127.     (* Prevent use_silently from searching in the path. *)
  128.     if name <> "" && Filename.is_implicit name
  129.     then File (Filename.concat Filename.current_dir_name name)
  130.     else filename)
  131.     | (Stdin | String _) as x -> x
  132.   in
  133.   use_silently ppf explicit_name

  135. (* Toplevel initialization. Performed here instead of at the
  136.    beginning of loop() so that user code linked in with ocamlmktop
  137.    can call directives from Topdirs. *)
  138. let _ =
  139.   if !Sys.interactive then (* PR#6108 *)
  140.     invalid_arg "The ocamltoplevel.cma library from compiler-libs \
  141.                  cannot be loaded inside the OCaml toplevel";
  142.   Sys.interactive := true;
  143.   Topeval.init ()

  145. ‌let find_ocamlinit () =
  146.   let ocamlinit = ".ocamlinit" in
  147.   if Sys.file_exists ocamlinit then Some ocamlinit else
  148.   let getenv var = match Sys.getenv var with
  149.     | exception Not_found -> None | "" -> None | v -> Some v
  150.   in
  151.   let exists_in_dir dir file = match dir with
  152.     | None -> None
  153.     | Some dir ->
  154.         let file = Filename.concat dir file in
  155.         if Sys.file_exists file then Some file else None
  156.   in
  157.   let home_dir () = getenv "HOME" in
  158.   let config_dir () =
  159.     if Sys.win32 then None else
  160.     match getenv "XDG_CONFIG_HOME" with
  161.     | Some _ as v -> v
  162.     | None ->
  163.         match home_dir () with
  164.         | None -> None
  165.         | Some dir -> Some (Filename.concat dir ".config")
  166.   in
  167. ‌  let init_ml = Filename.concat "ocaml" "init.ml" in
  168.   match exists_in_dir (config_dir ()) init_ml with
  169.   | Some _ as v -> v
  170.   | None -> exists_in_dir (home_dir ()) ocamlinit

  172. ‌let load_ocamlinit ppf =
  173.   if !Clflags.noinit then ()
  174.   else match !Clflags.init_file with
  175.   | Some f ->
  176.     if Sys.file_exists f then ignore (use_silently ppf (File f) )
  177.     else fprintf ppf "Init file not found: \"%s\".@." f
  178.   | None ->
  179.       match find_ocamlinit () with
  180.       | None -> ()
  181.       | Some file -> ignore (use_silently ppf (File file))

  183. (* The interactive loop *)

  185. exception PPerror

  187. ‌let loop ppf =
  188.   Clflags.debug := true;
  189.   Location.formatter_for_warnings := ppf;
  190.   if not !Clflags.noversion then
  191.     fprintf ppf "OCaml version %s%s%s@.Enter #help;; for help.@.@."
  192.       Config.version
  193.       (if Topeval.implementation_label = "" then "" else " - ")
  194.       Topeval.implementation_label;
  195.   begin
  196.     try initialize_toplevel_env ()
  197.     with Env.Error _ | Typetexp.Error _ as exn ->
  198.       Location.report_exception ppf exn; raise (Compenv.Exit_with_status 2)
  199.   end;
  200.   let lb = Lexing.from_function refill_lexbuf in
  201.   Location.init lb "//toplevel//";
  202.   Location.input_name := "//toplevel//";
  203.   Location.input_lexbuf := Some lb;
  204.   Location.input_phrase_buffer := Some phrase_buffer;
  205.   Sys.catch_break true;
  206.   run_hooks After_setup;
  207.   load_ocamlinit ppf;
  208.   while true do
  209.     let snap = Btype.snapshot () in
  210.     try
  211.       Lexing.flush_input lb;
  212.       (* Reset the phrase buffer when we flush the lexing buffer. *)
  213.       Buffer.reset phrase_buffer;
  214.       Location.reset();
  215.       Warnings.reset_fatal ();
  216.       first_line := true;
  217.       let phr = try !parse_toplevel_phrase lb with Exit -> raise PPerror in
  218.       let phr = preprocess_phrase ppf phr  in
  219.       Env.reset_cache_toplevel ();
  220.       ignore(execute_phrase true ppf phr)
  221.     with
  222.     | End_of_file -> raise (Compenv.Exit_with_status 0)
  223.     | Sys.Break -> fprintf ppf "Interrupted.@."; Btype.backtrack snap
  224.     | PPerror -> ()
  225.     | x -> Location.report_exception ppf x; Btype.backtrack snap
  226.   done
